title: Dungeon of the Old Gods
description: Dungeon. Quest. Adventure.A journey into madness.Descend into the dungeon.When John Younger answered the Regentâ€™s call to find a missing prince, he thought it would be an easy way to make some quick coin.He was wrong.Thrust into a life-or-death battle with creatures only heard about in stories long since forgotten, John finds himself in a the enemy of elder ones and old gods.As he descends into the heart of darkness, John must use all of his brains and brawn to survive each floor of the dungeon.He is not alone. He'll need to save the others and gain the favor of those who dwell within.Will John make it to the final floor and escape? Or will he succumb to those who dwell below?
author: Wolfe Locke
